column5: Before my wife and I had kids ... I stopped along-side highway 17 and hung on a sign bearing my last name.    For the first time in a long time I got to drive back from Ottawa during daylight hours and decided to stop and take a pic with the kids.     Randy
Nice last name. I used to know some Ways back in the 70's.
Sooo why did'nt you hang from that sign again?  Nice representation of then and now.
I have an extra 60Lbs of   to drag up that pole...I'm not so sure that the sign would've held the extra   .   Randy
Your last name is Way Randy? LOL
your either getting shorter or the sign is getting taller...
Sign stayed the same height... I just got more
